===============================================================================
CHANGELOG — https_settings
===============================================================================

VERSION 1.0.1 — 2025-04-09
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Initial public release.

NEW:
- Portable Windows desktop app to configure Apache HTTP Server (httpd)
- Define and manage Apache Server Locations
- Create and edit multiple named configurations
- Edit SRVROOT path with automatic defaults
- Manage multiple HTTP and HTTPS ports with activation toggles
- Create Virtual Hosts with:
  - Custom ports
  - ServerName and DocumentRoot
  - Multiple Aliases with URL path and target directory
- Live editing with validation and user-friendly error messages
- Configuration read/write support for httpd.conf and httpd-vhosts.conf
- Config File Content Panel with highlighted Apache config lines
- Configuration Info and Server Info summary views
- Export and Import configurations as standalone JSON files
- Auto-generated README, LICENSE, and packaging script

NOTES:
- Apache must be installed separately
- The app does not start or stop the server — only manages configurations
